com.camerontec.catalys.server.management.mbean

Class OpenMBeanWithNotifications

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.NotificationBroadcasterSupport
      • com.camerontec.util.jmx.openmbean.BaseDynamicMBean
        • com.camerontec.util.jmx.openmbean.BaseOpenMBean
          • com.camerontec.catalys.server.management.mbean.OpenMBeanWithNotifications
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicMBean, MBeanRegistration, NotificationBroadcaster, NotificationEmitter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterMemberMBean

    public abstract class OpenMBeanWithNotifications
extends BaseOpenMBean
    Provides open mbeans with the ability to send attribute change notifications.

    • Method Detail

      • notificationSequenceNumber

        protected int notificationSequenceNumber()
        Returns:
        the next notification sequence number to use

      • sendAttributeChangeNotification

        public void sendAttributeChangeNotification(String attributeName,
                                            Object newAttributeValue)
        Emits a notification indicating that the value of one of our attributes has changed. This notification has a notification type of the form jmx.attribute.change.<attribute name> and its user data contains the new attribute value.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the attribute
        newAttributeValue - the new attribute value
